TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MediaElement extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class MediaElement Inherits FrameworkElement Implements IUriContext
public ref class MediaElement : System::Windows::FrameworkElement, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type MediaElement = class inherit FrameworkElement interface IUriContext

summary.span: 表示包含音频和/或视频的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that contains audio and/or video.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用应用程序分发媒体时，不可将媒体文件用作项目资源。When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource. 在项目文件中，必须改为将媒体类型设置为 `Content` 并将 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 设置为 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`. 可以使用以下两种不同模式，具体取决于控件的决定因素： 独立模式或时钟模式。 can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the control: independent mode or clock mode. 在独立模式下，使用时类似于一个映像，并[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]可以直接指定。When used in the independent mode, the is analogous to an image, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] can be directly specified. 在时钟模式下可视为一个动画的目标，因此其中包含对应和计时树中的条目。In clock mode, the can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding and entries in the timing tree. 媒体模式的详细信息，请参阅[多媒体概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md)。For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md). 有关控制的示例在独立模式下，请参阅[如何： 控制 MediaElement （播放、 暂停、 停止、 卷和速度）](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed.md)。For an example of controlling a in independent mode, see [How to: Control a MediaElement (Play, Pause, Stop, Volume, and Speed)](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed.md). 直到引发事件和的控件将报告为零，因为媒体内容用于确定的最终大小和位置的控件。Until the event has been raised, the and of the control will report as zero as the media content is used to determine the final size and location of the control. 对于仅包含音频内容，这些属性将始终为零。For audio only content, these properties will always be zero. 对于固定的大小控件，和/或可以设置属性。For a fixed size control, the and/or properties can be set. 但是，若要保留媒体的纵横比，设置或属性，但不可同时使用两者。However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the or properties but not both.

summary.span: 获取或设置扬声器的音量比。

The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为-1 表示 100%的左侧和右侧发言人和 1 表示 100%的右侧说话人。A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将该媒体元素放入在其中利用计时引擎的模式。Setting this property puts the media element into a mode in which it utilizes the timing engine. 停止以前播放任何媒体和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]关联到新打开时钟。Any media that was previously playing is stopped and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] associated with the new clock is opened.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 在当前位置暂停媒体。

span.span: Pauses media at the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果媒体当前正在运行，则此方法会暂停媒体。This method pauses the media if the media is currently running. 方法可用于恢复。The method can be used to resume. 可以使用此方法时，才属性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 当属性为非`null`，计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 此方法有效果才属性设置为。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Play() cil managed

summary.span: 从当前位置播放媒体。

span.span: Plays media from the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将继续播放媒体，如果它已暂停或开始媒体，如果不是当前处于活动状态。This method will begin the media if it is not currently active or resume media if it is paused. 如果媒体当前正在运行，则此方法无效。This method has no effect if the media is currently running. 可以使用此方法时，才属性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 当属性为非`null`，计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 此方法有效果才属性设置为。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Position { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Position : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置媒体播放时间的当前进度位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current position of progress through the media's playback time.

value.span: 自媒体开始以来的时间量。

span.span: The amount of time since the beginning of the media.
The default is 00:00:00.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性可以可跳转到播放 （也称为查找） 在不同时间点。Setting this property can enable you to jump to different points in playback (also known as seeking). 并非所有的媒体类型都允许查找操作。Not all media types allow seek operations. 如果媒体源不允许查找会触发事件。The event will fire if the media source does not allow seeking. 此属性不起作用之前后事件已发生。This property has no effect until after the event has occurred. 可以设置此属性时，才属性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 当属性为非`null`，计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.

span.span: The property is not .

member this.ScrubbingEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否将在暂停状态下为查找操作更新帧。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the will update frames for seek operations while paused.

value.span: 如果在暂停状态下更新帧，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if frames are updated while paused; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`false`、 查找到特定位置将仅更新显示的帧如果播放媒体。When set to `false`, seeking to a specific location will only update the displayed frame if media is playing. 设置到`true`也会产生一些性能损失，尤其是在以交互方式控制媒体的播放。Setting to `true` can incur some performance costs, especially when interactively controlling media playback. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置 上的媒体来源。

The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the source of the element.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值会导致要播放的媒体。Setting the value of this property causes the media to play. 可以设置此属性时，才属性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 当属性为非`null`，计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SpeedRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.SpeedRatio : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置媒体的速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the speed ratio of the media.
The speed ratio of the media.

value.span: 有效范围介于 0（零）和无穷大之间。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 (zero) and infinity.

value.span: 小于 1 的值产生比正常播放慢的速率，而大于 1 的值产生比正常播放快的速率。

span.span: Values less than 1 yield slower than normal playback, and values greater than 1 yield faster than normal playback.
Negative values are treated as 0.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置此属性时，才属性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 当属性为非`null`，计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 除非可能不会发生音频播放的值为 1。Audio playback may not occur unless the value of is 1.

span.span: The property is not .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法时，才属性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 当属性为非`null`，计时引擎会控制媒体播放行为。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 此方法有效果才属性设置为。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

member this.Stretch : System.Windows.Media.Stretch with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值描述 如何填充目标矩形。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that describes how a fills the destination rectangle.

value.span: 所呈现的媒体的拉伸值。

span.span: The stretch value for the rendered media.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了不同值。The following illustration demonstrates the different values. ![不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置")![Different TileBrush Stretch settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "Different TileBrush Stretch settings") 不同的渐变的扩展方法Different gradient spread methods ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并设置模式下的内容。The following example shows how to create a and set the mode of content. [!code-cpp[ViewBoxCode#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ViewBoxCode/CPP/ViewboxCode.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ViewBoxCode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ViewBoxCode/Csharp/ViewboxCode.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ViewBoxCode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ViewBoxCode/VisualBasic/ViewBoxCodeVB.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定有关应用于图像的缩放的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the restrictions on scaling that are applied to the image.

value.span: 用于指定元素的拉伸方向的值。

span.span: The value that specifies the direction the element is stretched.
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置媒体的音量。

span.span: Gets or sets the media's volume.

The default is 0.5.
